how-notifs-work-1: Every day, at 12PM NZ time, the system checks if an outage is planned in the area you subscribed to within the next seven days.
how-notifs-work-2: If one is, you will receive an email with details about the outage - when it is, the start and end times, and how many customers are affected. You may also receive future emails if the status of the outage changes.
subscribe-with-coords-2: Right click your address and click the first option to copy the coordinates.
subscribe-with-coords-3: In the "Subscribe to Outages" form below, ensure the "No" option in the question is clicked and enter your street address in the "Location" field.
subscribe-with-coords-4: You should then get a confirmation email with details of your notification.
subscribe-without-coords-1: In the "Subscribe to Outages" form below, ensure the "No" option in the question is clicked and enter your street address in the "Location" field.
subscribe-without-coords-2: You should then get a confirmation email with details of your notification.
unsubscribe-1: In the "Active Notifications" section below, search for any notification subscriptions associated to your email address.
unsubscribe-2: Click the "Unsubscribe" button in the subscription you want to unsubscribe from.
notif-sub-form-location-placeholder: Enter the location / area where you would like to be notified for (e.g. Smith Street)
notif-sub-form-one-field-change: Please ensure at least one field has been changed before submitting
cron-no-outages: No outages exist! Please run the update script, or check any actually exist on the Counties Power website
notif-email-new: There has been a status change for an upcoming planned power outage which may be in the location you subscribed to notifications for.
notif-email-changed: There is an upcoming planned power outage which may be in the location you subscribed to notifications for.
sub-confirm-email-unsub: If this subscription was made in error, or you no longer wish to receive notifications, you can unsubscribe $unsubLink
